about_the_game:
Buy the EA SPORTS™ WRC 24 Le Maestros Content Pack and Dive into a golden era of rally racing with the Le Maestros Pack, a tribute to the iconic French dominance from the late 1990s to the 2010s. With 6 stages being added to Monte Carlo & Portugal, seven classic cars to master & iconic liveries.

NEW STAGES:

Monte Carlo — Experience the thrilling, new Monte-Carlo stages with precision-testing S Bends, drops, narrow bridges, classic hairpins, and dynamic terrain. Surface: tarmac/ice.
  • Briançonnet - Entrevaux (14.3km)
  • Entrevaux - Briançonnet (13.7km)
  • Les Vénières (6.9km)
  • Parbiou (6.2km)
  • Le Champ (7.4km)
  • Pertus (7.4km)

Portugal — Take new stages in Portugal & among them the iconic Fafe stage with its thrilling jumps and stunning vistas. Surface: Gravel.
  • Fafe (11.3km)
  • Vila Pouca (11km)
  • Barbosa (5.7km)
  • Passos (5.5km)
  • Vilela (5.5km)
  • Ruivães (5.5km)

NEW CARS:
  • Citroën Xsara Kit Car
  • Peugeot 206 S1600
  • Citroën C2 R2 Max
  • 2018 Citroën C3 WRC
  • 2012 Citroën DS3 WRC
  • 2013 Volkswagen Polo R WRC
  • Mini Countryman Rally Edition

This Le Maestros Content Pack introduces a new vehicle class to the game: WRC 2012-2016.

legal_notice: Requires EA SPORTS WRC (sold separately) and all game updates. Limited Spanish language support.

short_description: Experience the thrill of rally with 2 updated stages: Monte Carlo's Briançonnet and the iconic Portugal's 2023 Fafe, which will test your skills to the limit along with 7 new classic cars!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
